meanings.sent1: The teacher's scolding chagrinned the student who forgot to do their homework.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally spilled her drink, chagrinning herself in front of her friends.

meanings.definition: A feeling of vexation or humiliation

meanings.sent3: His chagrinning was visible as he realized he had worn mismatched socks to work.
